<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Synergistic Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1125) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Halcyon Speaker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=30)

**Prerequisites**
[Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1118); [Fulminating Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=1123); Legendary in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2); Legendary in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You combine your synergy and spells into a fantastic web of magic, allowing you to cast two spells at once. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell from one of your halcyon spell slots, after that spell resolves, you can Cast another Spell as a free action. This spell must be cast from one of your halcyon spell slots and be a spell that would normally take two actions to cast.
